flawed_nl_solution:
Stan needs to write 2000 words because 5 x 400 = <<5*400=2000>>2000
This will take him 40.0 minutes because 2000 / 50 = <<2000/50=40.0>>40.0
He drinks 0.025 an ounce per minute because 15 / 60 = 0.025
He will drink 1.0 ounces of water while writing the paper because 40.0 x (0.025) = <<40.0*0.025=1.0>>1.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 0.25, not 0.025. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
